bundles.description: You will get 1 COMICBOOK coin redeemable for a COPY OF THE STANDARD EDITION of the first ever graphic novel on Bitcoin: The Hunt for Satoshi Nakamoto. You'll also get 300 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICBOOK

bundles.description: You will get 1 COMICSPECIAL coin which is redeemable for a COPY OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. You'll also get 1200 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICFOUNDERBRONZE

bundles.description: You will get 1 COMICSPECIAL coin which is redeemable for a COPY OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 5 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. You'll also get 3000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICFOUNDERSILVER

bundles.description: You will get 2 COMICSPECIAL coins which are redeemable for 2 COPIES OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 10 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. You'll also get 6000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICFOUNDERGOLD

bundles.description: You will get 2 COMICSPECIAL coins which are redeemable for 2 COPIES OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 10 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. Thirdly you'll be mentioned in the list of influential bitcoin people in the back of the book. You'll also get 12000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: BTCHALLOFFAME

bundles.description: You will get 5 COMICSPECIAL coins which are redeemable for 5 COPIES OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 10 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. Thirdly you'll be mentioned in the list of influential bitcoin people in the back of the book. You will appear in the comic - the illustrator will use a photo supplied by you to draw your image into the comic. You will receive the ORIGINAL artwork frame - signed by the authors and illustrator. You'll also get 30000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICBRONZE

bundles.description: You will get 5 COMICSPECIAL coins which are redeemable for 5 COPIES OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 10 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. Thirdly you'll be mentioned in the list of influential bitcoin people in the back of the book. You will appear in the comic - the illustrator will use a photo supplied by you to draw your image into the comic. You will receive the ORIGINAL artwork frame - signed by the authors and illustrator. You will receive a copy of a hand produced special edition - large format book. You'll also get 60000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICSILVER

bundles.description: You will get 5 COMICSPECIAL coins which are redeemable for 5 COPIES OF THE FOUNDERS EDITION of the comic. This edition has a hard cover and your name will be printed on a founders' roll call in the back cover. Secondly you'll get 10 copies of the standard edition which will be sent to schools. Thirdly you'll be mentioned in the list of influential bitcoin people in the back of the book - A special feature about how you helped make this project possible. You will appear in the comic (all editions) - the illustrator will use a photo supplied by you to draw your image into the comic. You will receive the ORIGINAL artwork frame - signed by the authors and illustrator. A special illustration will be hand created by the illustrator of you along with the Bitcoincomic team.  This original artwork will be a ONE OFF - signed by the entire Bitcoin comic and Swarm team, Framed and sent to you. You will receive a copy of a hand produced special edition - large format book.. You'll also get 120000 COMICCOINS which will have voting rights in the future of the project and more.
bundles.name: COMICGOLD
